attributes.action: Abolish the cervical screening age limit of 25
attributes.additional_details:
Cervical screening is important for any sexually active woman in detecting cervical cancer and other serious medical issues. 
Many young women are sexually active from age 16 and many lives could be saved by lowering the age limit or abolishing it all together.
attributes.background: Lower the age limit at which women can be cervically screened

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623485

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to make cervical screening available from a different age to that requested by the above petition, but it would need to be clear what age you want cervical screening to be available from.
